item.title: “There are vast regions of Black life that have nothing to do...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

“There are vast regions of Black life that have nothing to do with suffering or oppression. We lead lives that are also filled with joy, romance, laughter and astonishing beauty, but those stories don't tend to grab the headlines. It's time to change that.”

There are vast regions of Black life that are filled with joy, romance and beauty. Here are some favorite examples.

cnn.com

We need more 'trauma-free Blackness.' Here's a start

There are vast regions of Black life that are filled with joy, romance and beauty. Here are some favorite examples.There are vast regions of Black life that are filled with joy, romance and beauty. Here are some favorite examples.
item.author: Black Lives Matter 5280

item.title: *Seguido en Español The attacks on our immigrant community will...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

*Seguido en Español

The attacks on our immigrant community will continue as long as they are not protected in our cities!

Black Immigrants are more likely to be criminalized by the police system or die at the hands of law enforcement. A city as diverse as Aurora must be a safe place for everyone, regardless of their race or immigration status. Aurora City Council and Mayor Coffman have he opportunity to take meaningful steps to reinvest in our community and protect ALL Auror...a Residents.

Join us on Monday January 11th 6:30pm to watch Aurora City Council Vote on the Safer Aurora and Immigrant Legal Defense Fund Ordinances.

Have your voice heard!! Share your testimony for both ordinances on Monday:

1. Call the live public comment line at 855.695.3475 and once connected press *3 to reach the operator.

2. The operator will ask which item the caller would like to speak on and place you in the queue for that item.

3. The public comment call-in line will open at 6:00 p.m. the day of the Council Meeting.

Send a loud and clear message to Aurora City Council Members and Mayor Coffman and let them know that immigrants are WELCOME in Aurora! Ask them to vote YES on the Safer Aurora Ordinance and immigrant Legal Defense Fund.

Join our movement! https://linktr.ee/COPApower

***
¡Los ataques a nuestra comunidad de inmigrantes continuarán mientras no estén protegidos en nuestras ciudades!

Es más probable que los inmigrantes negros sean criminalizados por el sistema policial o mueran a manos de las fuerzas del orden. Una ciudad tan diversa como Aurora debe ser un lugar seguro para todos, independientemente de su raza o estado migratorio. El Concejo Municipal de Aurora y el Alcalde Coffman tienen la oportunidad de tomar medidas significativas para reinvertir en nuestra comunidad y proteger a TODOS los residentes de Aurora.

Únase a nosotros el lunes 11 de Enero a las 6:30 pm para ver la votación del Concejo Municipal de Aurora sobre las ordenanzas del Fondo de Defensa Legal para Inmigrantes y Aurora Más Segura.

¡Haz que se escuche tu voz! Comparta su testimonio de ambas ordenanzas el lunes:

1. Llame a la línea de comentarios públicos en vivo al 855.695.3475 y una vez conectado presione * 3 para comunicarse con el operador.

2. El operador preguntará sobre qué elemento llama, tomara su nombre y la colocara en la linea.

3. La línea telefónica para comentarios públicos se abrirá a las 6::30 p.m. el día de la reunión del Consejo.

Envíe un mensaje alto y claro a los miembros del Concejo Municipal de Aurora y al alcalde Coffman y hágales saber que los inmigrantes son BIENVENIDOS en Aurora. Pídales que voten a FAVOR de la Ordenanza Safer Aurora y el Fondo de Defensa Legal para Inmigrantes.

¡Únete a nuestro movimiento! https://linktr.ee/COPApower

See More

MON, JAN 25

Safer Aurora- City Council Vote Watch Party

Online Event12 people interested

item.title: Black Lives Matter 5280Denver Homeless Out LoudTHIS IS WHAT COMMUNITY LOOKS LIKE!!! While the city is traumatically displacing our residents...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280Denver Homeless Out Loud

THIS IS WHAT COMMUNITY LOOKS LIKE!!!
While the city is traumatically displacing our residents during a pandemic, we choose to be part of the solution. We now ha...ve 2 porta potties for community use. They are serviced 5 times a week AND we compensate an unhoused community member for cleaning the inside. We also increased our trash service to assist with this need. Win, win, win!
If the city needs help getting on board, we're happy to teach you how!!! We love our community!

See More

item.title: Post from Zhalisa Clarke: "Black & Brown Women: Join a...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Post from Zhalisa Clarke:
"Black & Brown Women: Join a community of sisters in uplifting workshops to start the new year with a mindful approach to all areas of life -- from our health, to our pocket books, we will get alignment in our mind, body, and spirits! Sunday January 24th!
We'll have a naturopathic doctor talking about Prioritizing Your Health in 2021. We'll have a financial expert sharing a Mindful Approach to Financial Wellness. I'll be teaching about how to lever...age breathwork techniques at work. There will be a beautiful restorative yoga class, and we'll end with a cardology reading for the year; cardology predates tarot cards and combines astrology, the planets and more to make in depth predictions for our lives. Let's get this year started right! #blackwomen #blackwomenshealth #blackwomenwellness #latinwomen #bipocwomen"

See MoreStart the new year with a mindful approach to all areas of life, from mental and physical health, to professional and financial wellness!

eventbrite.com

Black and Brown Women's Wellness Summit: Reclaiming Our Well-being

Start the new year with a mindful approach to all areas of life, from mental and physical health, to professional and financial wellness!Start the new year with a mindful approach to all areas of life, from mental and physical health, to professional and financial wellness!

item.title: Black Lives Matter 5280Welton Street CafeCOVID-19 has hit us hard. Many harder than others. We at Welton Street Cafe try to be here to...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280Welton Street Cafe

COVID-19 has hit us hard. Many harder than others. We at Welton Street Cafe try to be here to support our community in the ways that we can. If you are in need ...of employment and have relevant work experience, then please send us your resume. We are now accepting resumes for both the front and the back of the house.

item.title: Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will continue to share links to bail/legal support fundraising in Denver, Minneapolis and beyond. We encourage friends to donate to BLM5280’s Emergency Fund using Venmo http://venmo.com/BLM5280 . These donations will be used for bail, legal support, and provision of direct services for Black people impacted by the current and ongoing crisis. If you would like to make a tax-deductible donation that we will have access to at a later date, you can visit our Colorado Gives Day Page to donate through our fiscal sponsor, Rocky Mountain Peace and Justice Center.

Working with residents and organizations in Denver, Black Lives Matter 5280 assists in building more loving and united Black communities while eliminating anti-Black violence and racism. To expose, address and eradicate structures and systems of oppression in Denver, BLM5280 uses a holistic racial j...
